# Turst Fabric v4 in SDDZ

## Pre-requisite (Mandatory)
1) DevOps Role is required for the application that you are running in SDDZ. 
IDM: https://idm.vip.ebay.com/zta/#

2) Download `cloudsec` CLI from SelfService. More info can be found https://pages.github.corp.ebay.com/siam/siam-docs/

## Node Versions
1) Use `trust-fabric-ebay": "^1.10.0"` `service-instruments-ebay": "^4.52.0"`  Add below versions in package.json
```json
    "resolutions": {
        ...
        "**/@ebay/service-instruments-ebay": "^4.52.0",
        "**/@ebay/trust-fabric-ebay": "^1.10.0"
    }
```

## Running Node.js Application in SDDZ 

1) Set local environment to SDDZ
```shell
    $ export TESS_CLUSTER_TYPE=sddz 
```

2) Generate CodeGrant Token for your application. These steps should be successful before starting Node.js application.
```shell
    $ cloudsec auth login
    $ cloudsec codegrant exchange -a <application_name>
```
3) Start Node.js Application
```shell
    $ npm run dev
```
